addon.name: DOSBox@arch@
addon.extension:
DOSBox @pretty_version@ DOSBox emulates an IBM PC compatible computer running MS-DOS. DOSBox can be configured to run a wide range of DOS games, from CGA/Tandy/PCjr classics up to games from the Quake era.
Supported files: @supported_files@. If loading exe/com/bat the system directory will be searched for a 'dosbox.conf' file to load. If loading a *.conf file DOSBox will be loaded with the options in the config file.
Source: https://github.com/libretro/dosbox-libretro @platform@ true @broken@
